name: MEC Transworld Travel Wallet
description: Secure, minimalist and timeless – the ideal companion for your essential travel documents. Twill fabric is water resistant, so it'll withstand rainy Dublin days or a water bottle leaking in your carry on.Twill polyester fabric features a water resistant PU coating and DWR finish.Aluminum RFID shield layer prevents information theft from chipped cards.Clamshell access to main compartment with luggage grade YKK zipper.External flat pocket for airline tickets.Interior organizer has 5 internal card slots, pen holder loop and zippered pocket for coins.Two interior sleeves hold documents or bills.Dedicated passport sleeve is large enough to hold bulky 10-year Canadian passports.
